Who Shall Use It?
</font></p>
----
You're exactly the guy who need it if -
  * you are developing your own SFTP client such as desktop version,  RIA version and customized version for some Enterprise Application
  * or you simply have to put or get files through SFTP protocol in a certain Enterprise Application
  * or any other scenarios where you have to deal with SFTP.
